title.rendered: Digiperform in Media: “What Recruiters look on a candidate’s Social Media Profile”- Vaibhav Vats

content.rendered:
“What Recruiters look on a candidate’s Social Media Profile“

 

The prominent online HR magazine – “People Matters” has featured Vaibhav Vats, Co-Founder of Digiperform in the authored article “Here’s what recruiters look on a candidate’s social media profile” under recruitment (Skilling) section, on 2nd May 2018.

The article focuses on “How to make a compelling social media profile?” and includes:
  • Headshot on Social Media Profiles
  • Consistent Online Persona
  • Highlighting Skill Set and Achievements
  • Career-Relevant Groups
    Coverage Details: Headline- Here’s what recruiters look on a candidate’s social media profile Portal- People Matters Edition- Online Date- May 2nd, 2018 Link- https://www.peoplematters.in/article/career/heres-what-recruiters-look-for-on-a-candidates-social-media-profile-18137
